// DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. This file will be overwritten when re-running go-raml.
package theclient

import (
	"encoding/json"
	"net/http"

	"examples.com/libro/goraml"
	"examples.com/libro/types"
)

type UriService service

func (s *UriService) UriUsers_IdGet(users_id string, headers, queryParams map[string]interface{}) (types.User2_0, *http.Response, error) {
	var err error
	var respBody200 types.User2_0

	resp, err := s.client.doReqNoBody("GET", s.client.BaseURI+"/uri/"+users_id, headers, queryParams)
	if err != nil {
		return respBody200, nil, err
	}
	defer resp.Body.Close()

	switch resp.StatusCode {
	case 200:
		err = json.NewDecoder(resp.Body).Decode(&respBody200)
	default:
		err = goraml.NewAPIError(resp, nil)
	}

	return respBody200, resp, err
}
